section.name: Release notes
section.p:
These are the release notes for Commons-Email version 1.0.
INTRODUCTION:
Commons-Email aims to provide a API for sending email. It builds on the JavaMail API with the aim of presenting a simplified API which is easy for developers who are not mail experts to use. It is a compact component with a small number of classes.
This is the first release of Commons Email. However, the codebase is mature and stable and so this is no reason not to recommend it for production.
REQUIREMENTS:
J2SE environments -----------------
Commons-Email requires at least javamail version 1.2 and should run with all versions above. Get it http://java.sun.com/products/javamail/
Commons-Email also requires the Java activation framework. Get it from http://java.sun.com/products/javabeans/glasgow/jaf.html
Commons-Email has been tested with JDK 1.3.1_16, JDK 1.4.2_09 and JDK 1.5.0_04.
J2EE environments -----------------
Commons-Email should be compatible with J2EE 1.3 and 1.4 compliant environments and run without additional requirements.
